press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to switch the lamp on or off.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure good condition and functionality.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to remove dust and maintain its appearance.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to adjust the lighting direction.

clean_head.description: Clean the head of the lamp for better light projection.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, the toggle button, and the head.
